text.div:
This value set defines the leading LOINC codes supported for laboratory reporting to the FOPH. The LOINC codes contained in this value set represent the primary observations used in our eLM processes and applications. Users should refer to this value set to retrieve the supported LOINC codes and their associated definitions.
Based on the specific LOINC codes contained in this value set, additional information regarding specimens (materials) and/or organisms might be mandatory. These specifications are categorized into groups, each with its own associated value set. When a LOINC code is linked to a particular group, the use of the corresponding specimen or organism value set becomes essential. Users are encouraged to refer to the related value sets, accessible via the canonical URLs provided, to ensure comprehensive and accurate reporting. This layered structure aids in providing a detailed context to the laboratory observations and ensures alignment with FOPH reporting requirements.

The "bot_spec" material group provides a curated set of codes representing specific materials. Each code within this group is selected to ensure consistency and accuracy for medical coding related to the primary LOINC codes. Clients using the "bot_spec" group should refer to the provided codes to ensure they capture and report material information correctly and consistently.
